(Simplified: 镏)
Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: A metal 釒 still 留; 留 also provides the pronunciation
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 留 [ liú ] to stay, to remain; to preserve, to keep; to leave a message;
①(鎦金)中國特有的鍍金法，所鎦的金層經久不退。
鎦金 [ liú jīn ]: gold-plating; gilded; gold-plated
鎦銀器 [ liú yín qì ]: gilded silverware; Classifiers: 件

鎦字的基本解释

鎦
liú

鎦
liù
均见“镏”。

鎦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liú］
［《廣韻》力求切，平尤，來。］
亦作“鐂1”。“镏1”的繁体字。
(1)涂饰金泥。
(2)姓。宋有镏文谟。见《万姓统谱·平尤》。
[②]［liù］
［《集韻》力救切，去宥，來。］
亦作“鐂2”。“镏2”的繁体字。
镏子，戒指。

鎦字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鎦； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1318第04
【唐韻】【集韻】【正韻】?力求切，音留。【說文】殺也。【徐鍇曰】說文無劉字，偏旁有之，此字又史傳所不見，疑此卽劉字也。从金从丣，刀字屈曲，傳寫誤作田爾。◎按玉篇作古文劉字。　又【集韻】力救切，音溜。梁州謂釜曰鎦。【揚子·方言】甑，自關而東或謂之酢鎦。

鎦字的源字形

字源演变：

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liú］
["Guangyun" strives to cut, Pingyou, come. ]
Also known as "鐂1". Traditional characters for "镏1".
(1) Coating gold mud.
(2) Last name. Song Youliu Wenmo. See "Wan Xing Tongpu·Pingyou".
[②]［liù］
["Ji Yun" tries to save Qi, go to You, come. ]
Also known as "鐂2". "镏2" in traditional characters.
Razor, ring.
Lute
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　镏; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 1318 04
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Positive Rhyme]? Strive for cutting, keeping the sound. [Said the text] Kill also. [Xu Kai said] It is said that there is no Liu character in the text, but there are some in the side. This character is not seen in history, so I suspect that this character Liu Liu is also. From Jin Congya, the word "knife" is buckled, and the writing is mistaken for Tian'er. ◎According to the jade articles, make the word Liu in ancient essays.　[Jiyun] tried to save the cut, the sound slipped. Liang Zhou said that the cauldron said 镏. [Yangtze Dialect] Zeng, from Guan to Dong, or so-called 酢镏.
